X wanted to bring you up to date on where we stand. There are a number
of other inquiries to people in process now, but no ©ore promises.
X' 11 try to keep you up to date on the happenings from this end. Please
let me know of ideas and leads you have in mind—and X'll be glad to
write the people involved (unless you know them well enough to put a
little pressure on them, in which case perhaps you'd rather write them).
Again, I'd like to say that I'm happy to put your name on the masthead
as editor.
Best regards
(Mrs.) Betty McKenzie
